meanings.definition: The state of being unable to speak due to shock or surprise.
meanings.sent1: The speechlessnesses of the child after seeing the magician perform was evident to everyone.

meanings.sent5: The speechlessnesses that followed his proposal was a moment she would never forget.

meanings.definition: The quality of being without speech.
meanings.sent1: The speechlessnesses of the library was due to the strict no-talking policy.
